perturbation.original_text: 4.2 Invoicing and Payment. Unless specifically agreed otherwise in writing by the Parties, including as agreed in a Project Plan, (i) all invoices and payments hereunder shall be in U.S. Dollars, (ii) payments will be made payable to Bachem at the address set forth in applicable Project Plan(s), and (iii) all undisputed payments shall be made within [***] of receipt of invoice by Magenta.
perturbation.changed_text: 4.2 Invoicing and Payment. Unless specifically agreed otherwise in writing by the Parties, including as agreed in a Project Plan, (i) all invoices and payments hereunder may be in any currency deemed suitable by Bachem, (ii) payments will be made payable to Bachem at an address communicated verbally, and (iii) all undisputed payments shall be made within 180 days of receipt of invoice by Magenta.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states payments must be in US dollars and made within a certain period. The change introduces the possibility of payment in any currency and extends the payment timeframe dramatically. This contradicts the original intent and creates uncertainty and potential financial strain.

perturbation.original_text: 5.2 Services. Bachem shall provide the Services in accordance with each Project Plan. Bachem will perform all Services in accordance with this Agreement and the agreed upon Specifications. All Products shall be packaged, labeled and shipped in accordance with this Agreement, the applicable Project Plan and all Applicable Laws. Bachem and its employees and agents have, and will continue to have, the knowledge, experience, facilities, equipment and skill to provide, and will provide, the Services in a professional and timely manner. Services will conform to consistently high standards of workmanship and the specifications applicable to each Project Plan.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.2 Services. Bachem shall provide the Services in accordance with each Project Plan. Bachem will perform all Services in accordance with this Agreement and the agreed upon Specifications. All Products shall be packaged, labeled and shipped in accordance with this Agreement, the applicable Project Plan and all Applicable Laws. Bachem and its employees and agents will endeavor to provide the Services in a professional and timely manner, but make no guarantees. Services will conform to what Bachem considers acceptable standards of workmanship.
perturbation.explanation: The original text guarantees that Services will be provided professionally, on time, and to high standards. The changed text removes these guarantees. This creates a contradiction by implying that Bachem does not commit to consistently high performance levels in every situation.

The amendment to Section 7.2(a) severely restricts Magenta's right to terminate for any reason. Previously, Magenta could terminate for *any* reason with proper notice; now, it's limited to convenience only. Also, Bachem can unilaterally decide whether it breached the contract or should cure that. This directly contradicts the broad right to terminate and creates an imbalance of power.
